Title: My Little Pony: The Movie
Genre: Animation, Adventure, Comedy, Drama, Family, Fantasy, Musical
Writer: Meghan McCarthy (story by), Joe Ballarini (story by), Meghan McCarthy (screenplay by), Rita Hsiao (screenplay by), Michael Vogel (screenplay by), Lauren Faust (based on the television series created by)
Actors: Uzo Aduba, Ashleigh Ball, Adam Bengis, Emily Blunt
Plot: After a dark force conquers Canterlot, the Mane 6 embark on an unforgettable journey beyond Equestria where they meet new friends and exciting challenges on a quest to use the magic of friendship to save their homeland.
